long_description: Perfect for traveling abroad, the Victorinox RFID Boarding Pouch uses RFID protection to guard your credit cards and other personal information from identity thieves with external scanning devices. RFID (radio frequency identification) protection technology safeguards personal data stored on RFID microchips in passports, credit cards, and ID cards. Two large pockets store tickets, passports, boarding passes and most sizes of currency. Zippered pocket for coins and other loose items. Micro-mesh slot keeps ID visible and accessible. Victorinox RFID Boarding Pouch comes with a soft, adjustable lanyard.
short_description: Perfect for traveling abroad, the Victorinox RFID Boarding Pouch uses RFID protection to guard your credit cards and other personal information from identity thieves with external scanning devices.
